page.title: 09GIRLS' FASHIONS
page.content: GROWN UPS ARE ALWAYS TELLING US THAT SO FAR AS CLOTHES ARE CONCERNED WE CHILDREN HAVE NEVER HAD IT SO GOOD. WHEN THEY WERE YOUNG MONEY WASN'T AS PLENTIFUL AND THEIR CHOICE OF CLOTHES WAS RESTRICTED. IN FACT, THEY HAD TO WEAR SCHOOL UNIFORMS AND THEY ALSO HAD A BEST OUTFIT AND WHEN THESE WERE OLD THEY WERE WORN UP AS PLAYING OUT CLOTHES. NOWADAYS, IN OUR SCHOOL, OUT OF A TOTAL OF 1O8 GIRLS 68 PREFERRED TO WEAR TROUSER IN WINTER; 89 'T' SHIRTS; 5O DRESSES TO SHIRTS AND 'T' SHIRTS IN SUMMER; 49 CHANGED INTO OLDER CLOTHES WHEN PLAYING OUT; 42 PREFERRED SOCKS TO TIGHTS; 44 SANDALS TO SHOES IN SUMMER; 45 WORE BEST OUTFITS AT 'DISCOS'; AND 48 HAD HAD THEIR EARS PIERCED.
